params.name: cmp
params.description: The function of comparison. Default: None.

params.name: key
params.description: The function of key. Default: None.

params.name: reverse
params.description: Whether to reverse when sorting the datasamples. If True, it means in descending order, and False meansin ascending order. Default: False.

params.name: buffer_size
params.description: Buffer size for sort. Ifbuffer_size < 0 or buffer_size is more than the lengthof the data, buffer_size will be set to the length of the data.Default: -1.
